Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Lafitte1212
Reviews.Content: The wife uses it ,way to small for me. No trouble so far............ We will keep it a while. Light weight

Reviews.Title: It's good enough
Reviews.Author: Rossiiya
Reviews.Content: This isn't the best phone ever, but as a replacement "dumbphone" is is very functional - texting is easy, the camera flash doubles as a flashlight. I haven't used it in Europe yet, but I imagine that it would work well as a travel phone

Reviews.Title: No good
Reviews.Author: Xiomara
Reviews.Content: This phone is not good  and now I don t have the box to returned  I need my money back

Reviews.Title: awful..
Reviews.Author: rashell
Reviews.Content: Was not what I expected would not recommend this to no one its a phone for  a 2 yrs don't waist your money on this cheap phone.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey
Reviews.Content: It's a basic phone but it does it's job well. Has bluetooth music player and all the nice things it could have.

Reviews.Title: Very nice for the price...
Reviews.Author: Usman Tanveer Malik
Reviews.Content: Its a decent phone with decent specs at the price of 21 dollars u r paying... i would have gone it a five stars but it was too much plastic.. again not bad for the price...

ProductInfo.Name: BLU Aria T174 Unlocked GSM Phone - Black/Red
